name: Remains of Attoractia
text:
If your J/ruler isn't "Invading Demon of Water, Valentina" or "Valentina, Released Terror", this card enters your field rested unless you pay 300 life.
Treat this card as a water magic stone and a darkness magic stone.
T: Produce U or B.
T: Target resonator token gains [+100/+100] until end of turn.
